text: Yada rakho, ki jihara kujha dharati ate akasam vica hai. Sabha alaha da hai. Alaha usa halata nu janada hai jisa vica tusi ho. Ate jisa dina uha usa vala li'ande janage â€œtam jihara kujha unham ne kita si, uha usa tom' unham nu khabaî€¼radara kara devega ate alaha hara ika ciza da janana vala hai
